nodes.description: 巴基斯坦拉合尔Data Darbar Sufi shrine遭遇连环自杀式爆炸，造成42人死亡
nodes.support_text: A twin suicide attack that killed 42 at Pakistan's most popular Sufi shrine has angered and frustrated Pakistanis

nodes.description: 过去一个月内，巴基斯坦拉合尔Ahmadi教派两座清真寺遭袭击，93人死亡
nodes.support_text: About a month ago, gunmen and suicide bombers attacked two mosques of the minority Ahmadi sect in Lahore, killing 93 people

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦政府强烈谴责袭击，强调反恐斗争的必要性
nodes.support_text: Pakistani officials condemned Thursday's bombings, using language they have frequently used to try to convince the population that the fight against militancy is not one they can ignore

nodes.description: 联合国强烈谴责袭击，批评针对宗教场所的暴力行为
nodes.support_text: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon strongly condemned the attack and said 'the deliberate targeting of a crowded place of worship makes this particularly vicious'

nodes.description: 美国大使馆声明支持巴基斯坦反恐，提及7.5亿美元援助计划
nodes.support_text: The U.S. Embassy said the Lahore attack 'demonstrates the terrorists' blatant disregard for the lives of the Pakistani people and the future of this country' and that the U.S. 'will continue to support Pakistan in the fight against a common enemy'

nodes.description: 80%巴基斯坦民众反对与美合作反恐（国际共和研究所民调）
nodes.support_text: Polls in recent years have shown that support for the Taliban has dropped in Pakistan dramatically as violence has exploded. But that hasn't been coupled by a surge in support for the U.S. or the Pakistani government's alliance with it

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦政府被指控在旁遮普省打击恐怖主义不力，涉历史支持反苏组织
nodes.support_text: Those who still pretend that we are not a nation at war are complicit in these deaths

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦提出调解阿富汗内部冲突方案，遭美国认为时机不成熟
nodes.support_text: Qaiser Hameed... said there should be efforts to start negotiations with all the stakeholders in Afghanistan, especially those disgruntled elements who are resisting the American occupation there

nodes.description: 分析人士指出巴基斯坦极端分子目标转向巴基斯坦政府而非美国
nodes.support_text: The sentiments underscored the low standing of the U.S. here. The wariness of the U.S. was all the more remarkable considering Thursday's attack was a direct assault on the moderate, Sufi-influenced Islam most Pakistanis still practice

nodes.description: 部分巴基斯坦民众认为美国撤出阿富汗可带来地区和平
nodes.support_text: some saying Friday that the solution to the country's terror threat is a U.S. exit from Afghanistan

nodes.description: 阿丽法·莫恩声称华盛顿在巴基斯坦鼓励印第安人和犹太人发动袭击
nodes.support_text: Arifa Moen claims Washington is encouraging Indians and Jews to carry out attacks in Pakistan

nodes.description: 华盛顿正鼓励印第安人和犹太人发动袭击

edges.support_text: About a month ago, gunmen and suicide bombers attacked two mosques of the minority Ahmadi sect in Lahore, killing 93 people
U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon strongly condemned the attack...
The U.S. Embassy said the Lahore attack 'demonstrates the terrorists' blatant disregard...
Polls in recent years have shown that support for the Taliban has dropped in Pakistan dramatically...
基于语义描述的时序逻辑
Those who still pretend that we are not a nation at war are complicit in these deaths
支持下降与暴力激增存在因果关系
Qaiser Hameed... said there should be efforts to start negotiations...
The wariness of the U.S. was all the more remarkable considering Thursday's attack was a direct assault on the moderate, Sufi-influenced Islam most Pakistanis still practice
some saying Friday that the solution to the country's terror threat is a U.S. exit from Afghanistan
制造行为引发公众不信任（基于temporal_order 3→2逻辑）
